entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near the British Columbia border early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
